Dictionary.Name: The Collaborative International Dictionary of English v.0.44

Definition.WordDefinition:
hipster \hip"ster\, n. [from Hip a. + -ster.] A person who is {hip}[2], a..
Syn: hepcat[2]. [PJC]
hipster n : someone who rejects the established culture; advocates extreme liberalism in politics and lifestyle [syn: {hippie}, {hippy}, {flower child}]
